name: teseo
description: Small utility that helps to find a way out of a relational db dependency labyrinth

scripts.lint: LIST=`git diff-index --name-only --diff-filter=d HEAD | grep .*\.js | grep -v json`; if [ "$LIST" ]; then ./node_modules/.bin/eslint $LIST; fi
scripts.lint-fix: LIST=`git diff-index --name-only --diff-filter=d HEAD | grep .*\.js | grep -v json`; if [ "$LIST" ]; then ./node_modules/.bin/eslint --fix $LIST; fi
scripts.build: rm -rf ./node_modules /tmp/teseo && npm run start && npm test && npm run lint

author: Daniel Spiers
